title: Association between perioperative hemoglobin decrease and outcomes of transfusion in patients undergoing on-pump cardiac surgery: An observational study from two Chinese heart centers
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Junhui He, Xinhao Liu, Li Zhou, Changwei Chen, Jing Liu, Min Yan, Yue Ming, Zhong Wu, Yingqiang Guo, Jin Liu, Lei Du
